messages.subject: Unschool Adventures Update!
messages.msgSnippet: (revised with working URL) Greetings fellow unschoolers! I am pleased to be working with Blake Boles and Abbi Miller on their newest project, UNSCHOOL
messages.messageBody:
(revised with working URL)

Greetings fellow unschoolers!

I am pleased to be working with Blake Boles and Abbi Miller on their newest
project, UNSCHOOL ADVENTURES!

UA offers innovative international and domestic trips for teenage unschoolers.

We are excited to announce that we are currently enrolling students for two
upcoming trips this year:

The NOVEL-WRITING RETREAT on the Oregon coast (near Seaside): Oct 31 - Dec 1,
2009

The AUSTRALIA trip: Dec 31, 2009 - Feb 12, 2010

After the wild success of our 6-week ARGENTINA trip last year, we are pleased to
offer more incredible adventures to the teen unschooling community!

Please visit our website, http://www.unschooladventures.com to learn more.
Alternatively you may write to Blake or Abbi at unschool.adventures@... with any
questions.

Feel free to pass this information along to any unschooled teens and families
that may be interested!

Thanks!

Cameron Lovejoy
Unschool Adventures, Marketing and Advertising Director
